page.title: 13 LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The Police Station was built in 1905 There are three cells in Maud police station.One policeman works in the Police Station.There are six rooms.A policeman's duties are to guard, watch and patrol, protect life and property, preserve the peace and detect offenders.Policeman said the funniest thing that had happened is chasing sheep that had run away from the Mart.There has been no policeman in the Police House at Maud since October 1985 when PC and his family moved to the city of Aberdeen.The police house is being redecorated at the moment in readinoss for the new policeman and his family. There is no serious crime in the area and very little vandalism.
